cards.tarot_imply_en: New Beginnings, Spontaneity, Leap of Faith, Innocence, Limitless Potential
cards.standalone_past_en: You have recently taken a significant leap of faith or embarked on a path others might deem risky. By shedding old emotional baggage, you stepped into the unknown with nothing but trust in the universe, finding a sense of freedom you hadn't felt in ages.
cards.standalone_present_en: The universe is daring you to jump! This is not the moment for over-analysis, but for trusting your instincts and embracing excitement like a cat spotting an open door. A fresh opportunity awaits right in front of you; you only need the courage to step forward without the fear of falling.
cards.standalone_future_en: A brand new adventure is waiting on the horizon. Prepare for unexpected twists and a journey that will permanently shift your perspective. You are about to reclaim a childlike wonder, enjoying the vast world free from old worries and rigid boundaries.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Bold choices from your past have led you to a precipice where trust in destiny is required once more. The gates of possibility are swinging open, inviting you to explore. Your future holds freshness and limitless learning.
cards.reading_summary_past_en: In the past, you took a brave leap of faith or walked away from heavy burdens, discovering the liberating power of trusting the unknown.
cards.reading_summary_present_en: Right now, life is inviting you to take a risk and embrace a fresh start; trusting your instincts today opens doors to unexpected joy.
cards.reading_summary_future_en: Going forward, a brand new adventure awaits that will require you to drop your defenses and explore the world with childlike wonder.
cards.love_past_en: You may have recently started a whirlwind romance or just broke free from stifling commitments with a sigh of relief.
cards.love_present_en: Love right now is like a playful kitten‚Äîfun, exciting, and unpredictable. Don't demand seriousness yet; just enjoy the moment.
cards.love_future_en: You will encounter love when you least expect it, possibly with someone completely outside your usual 'type'.
cards.love_reading_single_en: If you are single, approach love with a sense of adventure rather than a checklist; a spontaneous connection now could bring joy without heavy expectations.
cards.love_reading_couple_en: If you are in a relationship, this is the perfect time to break your routine; doing something silly or adventurous together will refresh your bond.
cards.career_past_en: You might have just quit a stable job or started a side project without a fully fleshed-out business plan.
cards.career_present_en: Fresh ideas are flowing; this is the prime time to initiate something you've never done before, led by creativity.
cards.career_future_en: A new career path will unfold, possibly a complete industry shift or discovering a passion that excites you every morning.
cards.finance_past_en: You have previously spent impulsively or taken financial risks without much forethought.
cards.finance_present_en: Be wary of impulse spending, but if it's an investment in learning or new experiences, it's worth it.
cards.finance_future_en: New financial opportunities will arrive through sheer luck or from channels you hadn't considered.
cards.action_prompt_en: Do the thing you are afraid to do. Take the first step now and ignore the plan!
cards.reflection_question_en: If you knew you wouldn't get hurt falling, what would you dare to do today?
cards.affirmation_en: I leap into the unknown with a joyful heart.
cards.timing_hint: When you least expect it / During Aquarius season
cards.hook_en: Ready to throw away the map and get wonderfully lost?
cards.ritual_2min_en: Do something 'out of character' right now, like wearing mismatched socks or taking a completely new route home, to awaken your inner playful spirit.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
List one thing you've always wanted to do but feared looking foolish doing.
Write it down.
Then ask yourself: 'So what?'
cards.keywords_light: Innocence, New beginnings, Freedom, Adventure, Spontaneity, Trust
cards.keywords_shadow: Recklessness, Naivety, Foolishness, Risk-taking, Distraction
cards.image_alt_en: A fluffy white kitten standing at the edge of a cliff, gazing at a butterfly, with a small knapsack on a stick, symbolizing innocent adventure.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A fearless white kitten standing on a cliff edge carrying a small bindle on a stick, looking at a white sun and chasing a butterfly, tarot card composition, art nouveau style, whimsical, intricate gold outlines, vibrant colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Discover the meaning of The Fool tarot card with Meow Tarot: A symbol of new beginnings, freedom, and the courage to leap into the unknown.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Secrets revealed, Confession, Failed plan, Returning, Coming clean
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have tried to cover up a mistake but couldn't outrun the truth, or decided to return and face a problem you fled. Past secrets might have just come to light.
cards.standalone_present_en: Busted! Hidden things are surfacing. You might feel pressured to confess or realize your plan isn't working. It's time to change tactics and stop the trickery.
cards.standalone_future_en: The truth will come out, and you must take responsibility. Confessing now will mitigate the damage. Running further will only make things worse.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past concealment is ending. The truth revealing itself now is an opportunity to fix things and start fresh with transparency in the future.
cards.love_past_en: Caught cheating, or returned to beg forgiveness from an ex after ghosting.
cards.love_present_en: Relationship secrets are out. Apologies and understanding are happening, or stopping the habit of secret chatting.
cards.love_future_en: Honesty can save it, but lies will lead to a bad end. Trust must be rebuilt.
cards.career_past_en: Secret plans leaked, or caught hiding a work mistake.
cards.career_present_en: Must fix sloppy work, or confess to the boss you can't finish on time. Don't keep making excuses.
cards.career_future_en: Honesty will save the day. Expect stricter internal audits.
cards.finance_past_en: Hidden debts were exposed, or stopped spending money secretly.
cards.finance_present_en: Returning stolen (or long-borrowed) items. Turning over a new financial leaf, or getting money back from a scammer.
cards.finance_future_en: You must pay damages, or start saving transparently and accountably.
cards.action_prompt_en: Confess now! Truth never dies. Admitting fault is the start of forgiveness.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you tired of wearing a mask and lying to yourself?
cards.affirmation_en: I choose to live my life based on truth and integrity.
cards.hook_en: No secrets are safe forever... the more you hide it, the more it stinks.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Write a confession on paper, then burn or tear it up to release the guilt you've been carrying.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What lie do you most want to confess?
How do you feel when a secret is out?
How will you rebuild trust with others?
cards.keywords_light: Confession, conscience, turning a new leaf, rethinking strategy, honesty
cards.keywords_shadow: Getting caught, pathology lying, cowardice, exposed secrets, shame
cards.image_alt_en: A cat dropping the stolen swords and looking guilty as other cats approach, the sun rising to reveal the theft.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A guilty ginger cat dropping five swords on the ground as a group of angry cats approaches from the background, sunrise illuminating the scene, expression of shame and being caught, art nouveau style, dramatic lighting --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Seven of Swords Reversed tarot meaning: Secrets revealed, getting caught, and confession. Learn how to come clean and rebuild trust.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Mental liberation, Finding a way out, Release from fear, Clarity, Awakening
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have felt trapped in a hopeless situation, but you found a way to untangle the knots and walk away. The suffocation of the past is slowly fading.
cards.standalone_present_en: The blindfold has fallen! You start to see the gaps between the swords surrounding you and realize those bonds were just your own thoughts. The exit is right there; just step forward.
cards.standalone_future_en: True freedom awaits. You will have the courage to face reality and deal with the problems you once feared. Your mind will become clear and sharp.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past fears that bound you are loosening, clearing the way for you to see the exit now and step into a future full of freedom and confidence.
cards.love_past_en: You decided to walk away from a suffocating relationship or stopped being afraid to open your heart to someone.
cards.love_present_en: Starting to talk rationally and reveal true feelings. Misunderstandings are being resolved.
cards.love_future_en: You will break free from a toxic relationship or find a solution to a long-standing problem.
cards.career_past_en: You dared to quit a job that stifled your talent or proposed an unconventional idea.
cards.career_present_en: Seeing new opportunities at work. Stopped negative thinking and started executing the plan.
cards.career_future_en: Work obstacles will be removed. You will work more smoothly and happily.
cards.finance_past_en: Successfully cleared a large debt or escaped a heavy financial burden.
cards.finance_present_en: Starting to see the light in solving financial problems. More mindful spending and planning.
cards.finance_future_en: Financial freedom will become reality if you maintain this discipline and intention.
cards.action_prompt_en: Step out! Don't hesitate. Believe in yourself that you can do it. The wide world awaits.
cards.reflection_question_en: What false belief have you recently unlocked from your mind?
cards.affirmation_en: I have the power to shape my own destiny freely.
cards.hook_en: The cage door isn't locked... come out and play, kitty!
cards.ritual_2min_en: Stand with arms wide open. Inhale deeply and shout 'Freedom!' (loudly or internally) to declare your intention of liberation.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What is the first thing you will do when fully free?
Which fear have you overcome and feel proud of?
What new path do you see after the fog lifts?
cards.keywords_light: Freedom, clarity, release, solutions, empowerment
cards.keywords_shadow: Confusion returning, hesitation, fear of freedom, self-doubt, regression
cards.image_alt_en: A cat stepping out of a circle of swords, bandage falling from its eyes, looking towards a bright horizon with a confident stride.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A confident white cat stepping out of a circle of eight swords stuck in the ground, red blindfold falling to the ground, looking towards a bright sunrise over green hills, sense of liberation, art nouveau style, vibrant colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Eight of Swords Reversed tarot meaning: Mental liberation, finding a way out, and release from fear. Discover your freedom and clarity.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Waking up, Releasing fear, Hope returning, Relief, End of nightmare
cards.standalone_past_en: You have just survived a long, torturous night of the soul. But you have opened your eyes to find that the worst is finally over.
cards.standalone_present_en: Deep breath... The light is pouring in! Anxiety is unraveling. You are starting to see a way out and are ready to ask for help or forgive yourself. The pressure is lifting.
cards.standalone_future_en: Your mental health will significantly improve. Inner peace will return. You will learn to manage stress and move forward with renewed confidence.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: The anguish of the past is fading. The present offers healing and awakening, leading to a bright future free from the shadows of fear.
cards.love_past_en: You dwelled in post-breakup sadness, or paranoia in the relationship has started to subside.
cards.love_present_en: Starting to discuss lingering issues openly. Misunderstandings are cleared, or you're healing and ready to move on from a bad love.
cards.love_future_en: Trust and brightness will return to the relationship, or you will find genuine happiness in solitude.
cards.career_past_en: Work stress is easing, or a major worry has been resolved.
cards.career_present_en: Seeing solutions to stuck projects. Receiving support from colleagues, or daring to ask for help when overwhelmed.
cards.career_future_en: Workplace pressure will decrease. You will work more happily and with greater ease.
cards.finance_past_en: Seeing light at the end of the debt tunnel, or financial worries are unraveling.
cards.finance_present_en: Found a solution for money management. Stopped stress-starving/insomnia and started fixing issues rationally.
cards.finance_future_en: Financial status will gradually improve. Stability returns after the crisis.
cards.action_prompt_en: Stop blaming yourself! Forgive your mistakes, then open the window to let sunlight and fresh air into your life.
cards.reflection_question_en: Which worry are you ready to release into the river today?
cards.affirmation_en: I am strong enough to walk through darkness into the light.
cards.hook_en: The nightmare is over... wake up and let's have some tasty treats.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Wake up and immediately smile at yourself in the mirror. Say thank you for 3 good things to clear lingering negative dream energy.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What worried you to death but turned out okay?
What is your best self-soothing method on bad days?
What is the small light you see today?
cards.keywords_light: Healing, relief, unburdening, reality check, optimism returning
cards.keywords_shadow: Lingering guilt, shame, persistent nightmare, refusal to seek help, despair
cards.image_alt_en: A cat sitting by a window with morning light streaming in, looking peaceful as nine swords fade away into shadows behind it.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A peaceful cat sitting on a windowsill bathed in warm morning sunlight, nine shadowy swords fading away into the dark corners of the room, atmosphere of relief and hope, Tarot Art Nouveau style, soft pastel colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Nine of Swords Reversed tarot meaning: Waking up, relief, and letting go of anxiety. Find hope and healing after the darkness.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Recovery, Survival, After the storm, Moving on, Rising up
cards.standalone_past_en: You recently survived the absolute worst moment of your life, like walking away from a major crash. The scars remain, but the acute pain is finally subsiding.
cards.standalone_present_en: The storm has passed! You are slowly picking yourself up and dusting off. Though still weak and shaken, the faint light on the horizon confirms you have survived.
cards.standalone_future_en: A new life is beginning. You will emerge stronger thanks to the lessons learned. The painful past will become just a memory that can no longer hurt you.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past suffering has ended. The present is for healing and recovery, paving the way for a bright future filled with new hope.
cards.love_past_en: Escaped an abusive or severely damaging relationship, or started healing after a devastating breakup.
cards.love_present_en: Starting to open up to love again, or a rock-bottom relationship is finally showing signs of improvement.
cards.love_future_en: You will permanently break free from painful love cycles and find a relationship that is truly healing.
cards.career_past_en: Lost a job or faced bankruptcy, but managed to survive and stay afloat.
cards.career_present_en: The career crisis is over. Seeing new opportunities or landing a job after a long gap.
cards.career_future_en: You will rebuild stronger than before. Lessons from failure will prevent you from making the same mistakes.
cards.finance_past_en: Was broke or drowning in debt, but started to get a handle on it.
cards.finance_present_en: Financial situation is looking up. Debt is decreasing, or you received help to weather the storm.
cards.finance_future_en: Financial stability will return, and you will be much better at risk management.
cards.action_prompt_en: Pull out the swords and bandage the wounds! Stop moaning; get up and start your new life.
cards.reflection_question_en: What is the first thing you want to do to celebrate your survival?
cards.affirmation_en: I have survived, and I am beginning again beautifully.
cards.hook_en: The worst pain is over... it's only up from here, kitty.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Wake up early, breathe in fresh air deeply. Stretch your limbs and thank your body for enduring the tough times with you.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What is the most valuable lesson from this failure?
What good things are you starting to see after the storm?
What promise will you make to yourself for this fresh start?
cards.keywords_light: Recovery, regeneration, rising up, hope returning, survival
cards.keywords_shadow: Relapse, refusing to heal, lingering pain, fear of trying again, victim mentality
cards.image_alt_en: A cat pulling swords out of the ground one by one, bandages falling off, looking weak but determined as the sun rises fully.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A determined black cat pulling ten swords out of the ground, bandages unraveling to reveal healing fur, bright warm sunrise banishing the last grey clouds, atmosphere of relief and resilience, art nouveau style, hopeful colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Ten of Swords Reversed tarot meaning: Recovery, survival, and rising from rock bottom. Learn how to heal and start over.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Missed opportunity, Financial loss, Bad investment, Greed, Delay
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have let a golden opportunity slip through your fingers or made a bad investment due to haste or lack of information. Poor planning in the past might be why you haven't fully established yourself yet.
cards.standalone_present_en: Watch out! Money is leaking from your pocket, or an expected opportunity might fall through. You might be too focused on material things, ignoring other joys, or facing frustrating delays in financial matters.
cards.standalone_future_en: Without caution, you face financial instability, or your dream project might fail due to lack of funding. The wait for success may be longer than anticipated.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past financial mistakes or missed chances are impacting your present. Without better management, the future holds struggles with cash flow or debt.
cards.love_past_en: A relationship started for material gain, or was unstable due to financial issues.
cards.love_present_en: Beware of a relationship too focused on materialism or conflicts over expenses. Love might stumble due to security anxieties.
cards.love_future_en: Lack of financial readiness might hinder starting a family or delay wedding plans.
cards.career_past_en: You took a job that didn't pay enough for the effort, or missed an offer by asking for too much.
cards.career_present_en: Salary stagnates, bonus disappoints, or your project budget gets rejected.
cards.career_future_en: Beware of risky business ventures or unfair employment contracts.
cards.finance_past_en: Spent lavishly leaving no savings, or lost a large sum gambling.
cards.finance_present_en: Finances are tight; income doesn't cover expenses. Don't count on windfalls; beware of investment scams.
cards.finance_future_en: You might have to dip into savings or face a temporary liquidity crunch.
cards.action_prompt_en: Plug the financial leaks now! Audit your accounts and cut unnecessary spending. Don't be greedy, or you'll lose more.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you valuing 'money' more than 'happiness'?
cards.affirmation_en: I learn from mistakes and build wealth with wisdom.
cards.hook_en: Every coin has two sides... don't just look at the profit and forget the risk, kitty.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Clean and polish an old or tarnished coin. Drop it into a piggy bank to clear financial blockages and start accumulating positive energy anew.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What was your worst financial decision, and what did you learn?
What expensive item did you buy but never use?
If you ran out of money tomorrow, what would you do?
cards.keywords_light: Reviewing budget, delayed success, learning frugality, recovering losses, caution
cards.keywords_shadow: Greed, missed chance, poverty mindset, bad investment, financial loss
cards.image_alt_en: A cat looking disappointed as a large gold coin slips from its paws and rolls away into a hole in the ground.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A disappointed calico cat watching a large golden coin slip from its paws and roll into a dark rabbit hole, withered garden background, overcast sky, sense of loss, tarot card style, art nouveau, muted greens and browns --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Ace of Pentacles Reversed tarot meaning: Missed opportunities, financial delays, and greed. Learn how to avoid bad investments and manage money wisely.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Imbalance, Overwhelmed, Financial mess, Disorganization, Dropping the ball
cards.standalone_past_en: You tried to carry the weight of the world or juggle too many tasks, leading to a crash. Past lack of focus resulted in a mess.
cards.standalone_present_en: You've dropped the ball! The plates you were spinning are crashing down. You feel exhausted and confused, unable to manage the chaotic tangle of your finances and work.
cards.standalone_future_en: Unless you reprioritize immediately, you will drown in work or debt. Forcing yourself to do it all will lead to failure. You must be brave enough to cut some things loose.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Overextending yourself in the past has caused present imbalance. Without shedding unnecessary burdens, you face a future of organizational failure.
cards.love_past_en: You tried to balance love with too many other things and failed, or were neglected by a partner who was too busy.
cards.love_present_en: No time for each other. The relationship is strained by financial stress or burnout. Feeling like you're carrying the relationship load alone.
cards.love_future_en: A breakup due to mismanagement is possible, or you might need to pause romance to sort out personal chaos.
cards.career_past_en: You took on too much and missed deadlines, or made mistakes due to haste and lack of focus.
cards.career_present_en: Crisis mode! Workflow collapse. Poor planning has you putting out fires daily instead of actually working.
cards.career_future_en: Beware of severe reprimands or losing credibility because you overpromised and underdelivered.
cards.finance_past_en: Drowning in debt due to overspending, or failing to juggle bills leading to more borrowing.
cards.finance_present_en: In the red! Expenses exceed income. The juggling act is over; it's time to face the financial music.
cards.finance_future_en: You might have to liquidate assets to pay debts or enter debt restructuring.
cards.action_prompt_en: Put it down now! Choose only the single most important thing to do, and say no to the rest.
cards.reflection_question_en: What are you carrying that adds absolutely no value to your life?
cards.affirmation_en: I accept my limits and reorganize my life.
cards.hook_en: Try to catch two fish and you'll lose both... pick one, kitty.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Write down all your tasks. Cross out half of them that aren't urgent today to train your mind in 'sufficiency' and 'letting go'.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
Which chaos was caused by your inability to say no?
If you could drop one burden, what would it be?
What is your emergency financial plan?
cards.keywords_light: Simplicity, asking for help, decluttering, focusing, admitting defeat
cards.keywords_shadow: Chaos, debt, mess, overwhelmed, loss of balance
cards.image_alt_en: A clumsy cat tripping over its own feet, dropping two coins that roll away in different directions into a stormy sea.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A clumsy ginger cat tripping on a slippery rock, two golden coins falling from its paws and rolling into dark stormy waves, chaotic scene, sense of loss and disarray, tarot card style, art nouveau, dark teal and grey tones --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Two of Pentacles Reversed tarot meaning: Financial disarray, being overwhelmed, and imbalance. Learn how to regain control and simplify.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Lack of teamwork, Poor quality, Criticism, Disorganization, Ignoring advice
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have experienced project failure due to team disharmony, or made mistakes because of poor initial planning. Past carelessness serves as a memorable lesson.
cards.standalone_present_en: Chaos in the ranks! Work is stalling due to lack of coordination. Or you might be facing criticism for sloppy, 'good enough' work. Fix it fast, or your reputation will suffer.
cards.standalone_future_en: If you don't improve how you collaborate, expected projects might collapse completely, or require a total redo‚Äîwasting both money and time.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past teamwork issues and lack of care are negatively impacting the present. Without listening to advice and improving quality, the future risks failure.
cards.love_past_en: Tried to build a future with the 'wrong' person, or refused to adapt to each other.
cards.love_present_en: Living separate lives; no shared future plans. Or feeling like you're the only one trying.
cards.love_future_en: The relationship might not survive due to a weak foundation or lack of family approval.
cards.career_past_en: Made mistakes that drew criticism, or clashed with colleagues, stalling progress.
cards.career_present_en: Team disintegration! Communication failure, or your stubbornness is damaging the work.
cards.career_future_en: Beware of project collapse due to lack of skill or cooperation. You might be sidelined.
cards.finance_past_en: Lost money hiring substandard workers or poor financial planning.
cards.finance_present_en: Budget blowout due to mismanagement. Don't enter joint ventures right now.
cards.finance_future_en: You might pay to fix shoddy work, or lose money due to lack of expertise.
cards.action_prompt_en: Stop making excuses! Accept the critique and improve your work. Lower your ego and listen.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you acting like a 'full cup', refusing to let anyone else's input in?
cards.affirmation_en: I open my mind to listen and learn from others.
cards.hook_en: Even a cat would turn its nose up at this sloppy work... go fix it.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Clean your desk or a shared workspace to shift the energy and reduce team friction.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What criticism do you hate hearing but know is true?
How have you contributed to the team's problems?
Which skill do you need to upgrade urgently?
cards.keywords_light: Revising plans, Constructive criticism, Learning curve, Fixing mistakes, Reorganizing
cards.keywords_shadow: Sloppiness, Conflict, Disorganization, Laziness, Lack of skill
cards.image_alt_en: A blueprint rolling off a table, tools scattered on the floor, and three cats arguing or ignoring each other in a messy construction site.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A chaotic construction scene inside a cathedral, blueprint torn and rolling off a table, hammer and nails scattered, three cats (Siamese, Persian, Tabby) hissing at each other or looking away, dust and disarray, Tarot Art Nouveau style, muted and dusty colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Three of Pentacles Reversed tarot meaning: Lack of teamwork, poor quality work, and criticism. Learn how to handle feedback and fix the mess.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Letting go, Generosity, Reckless spending, Releasing control, Loss
cards.standalone_past_en: You might have held on too tight until you snapped, forcing you to let go. Or you lost assets through recklessness after a long period of being overly cautious.
cards.standalone_present_en: The cage is open! You are relaxing your grip on security and starting to live a little. Alternatively, you might be spending recklessly to release pent-up stress.
cards.standalone_future_en: A major shift in assets is coming. You may have to sacrifice something material for spiritual freedom, or learn to trust others to help manage your resources.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past clinging is loosening, leading to present change‚Äîwhether positive (generosity) or negative (loss). The future holds a freedom you can choose to shape.
cards.love_past_en: A relationship ended due to suffocating jealousy or possessiveness.
cards.love_present_en: Opening up and lowering walls. Giving your partner space, or finally letting go of someone you've been holding hostage emotionally.
cards.love_future_en: The relationship will feel lighter without control issues, or you'll find a new love that values mutual freedom.
cards.career_past_en: You quit a secure but stifling job, or were removed from a position you clung to.
cards.career_present_en: Delegating tasks to others, or taking risks on new projects instead of always playing it safe.
cards.career_future_en: Job restructuring may force you to relinquish some power, but it will open doors to new opportunities.
cards.finance_past_en: Sudden lack of discipline caused money leaks, or a large payment was needed to fix a problem.
cards.finance_present_en: Wallet alert! You might be retail therapy-ing or overspending to impress friends.
cards.finance_future_en: You'll need to re-budget after a slip-up, or assets might depreciate.
cards.action_prompt_en: Let go of what you can't control! Don't drown clutching your treasures. Share, and you will float.
cards.reflection_question_en: Does letting this go make you feel 'loss' or 'freedom'?
cards.affirmation_en: The more I give, the more I receive in abundance.
cards.hook_en: Squeeze sand too tight and it slips away... try opening your paw, kitty.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Inhale deeply, clench fists tight. Exhale long, open hands instantly. Repeat 3 times to teach your body the feeling of release.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What are you most afraid of losing, and why?
If you donated 3 things today, what would they be?
When was the last time you felt truly relieved?
cards.keywords_light: Generosity, decluttering, releasing stress, charity, opening up
cards.keywords_shadow: Greed, losing money, gambling, carelessness, theft
cards.image_alt_en: A cat accidentally dropping the coins it was holding, looking surprised as they roll away, symbolizing loss of control.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A surprised tabby cat sitting on a chest, four golden coins slipping from its grasp and rolling down a hill, open lock, sense of accidental release or loss, tarot card style, art nouveau, dynamic movement --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Four of Pentacles Reversed tarot meaning: Letting go, reckless spending, and releasing control. Find the balance between saving and giving.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Recovery, End of hardship, Help arriving, Reconnection, Improving health
cards.standalone_past_en: You have just survived the hardest times, like stepping out of a blizzard into warmth. The feelings of isolation and lack are starting to fade.
cards.standalone_present_en: The light is here! You are recovering from financial or health issues. Someone is offering a hand, or you are finally spotting new opportunities to improve your life.
cards.standalone_future_en: Things will keep getting better. Scarcity will be replaced by stability, and hope will return. A new door is opening to welcome you.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past suffering is ending. The present is for healing and recovery, leading to a more stable and warmer future.
cards.love_past_en: A relationship that made you feel worthless has ended, or you have survived a period of loneliness.
cards.love_present_en: Starting to open up to love again, or a troubled relationship is being mended. Warmth is returning.
cards.love_future_en: You will find a supportive and understanding love; you won't have to feel alone anymore.
cards.career_past_en: Survived unemployment or a severe company crisis.
cards.career_present_en: Landed a new job after a long gap, or seeing ways to fix work problems. Stability is returning.
cards.career_future_en: Career will stabilize; past obstacles will be removed.
cards.finance_past_en: Survived being broke or overwhelmed by debt.
cards.finance_present_en: Starting to pay off debts or receiving income support. The financial crisis is passing.
cards.finance_future_en: Financial status will fully recover; you will stand on your own feet again.
cards.action_prompt_en: Open the door to help! Stop wallowing in misery and step out into the light.
cards.reflection_question_en: What has this hardship taught you to value the most?
cards.affirmation_en: I am strong and ready to start a better life.
cards.hook_en: The blizzard has stopped... come out and bask in the warm sun, kitty.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Open all windows to let stale air out. Light floral incense or a candle to welcome fresh energy of new beginnings.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What good things are starting to happen now?
Who reached out to help you in tough times?
What is your new goal after surviving this crisis?
cards.keywords_light: Recovery, improvement, end of bad luck, hope, charity
cards.keywords_shadow: Relapse, lingering debt, spiritual poverty, despair, fear of change
cards.image_alt_en: Two cats finding a warm shelter with food and a fire, looking relieved as the snowstorm clears outside.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: Two relieved cats sitting inside a cozy warm cottage with a fireplace and bowls of food, looking out a window at a clearing snowstorm, sunbeams breaking through clouds, atmosphere of comfort and safety, Tarot Art Nouveau style, warm orange and yellow tones --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Five of Pentacles Reversed tarot meaning: Recovery from hardship, end of isolation, and financial improvement. Find hope and healing.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Bad debt, Exploitation, Selfishness, Strings attached, Financial imbalance
cards.standalone_past_en: You might have given too much until you suffered, or someone exploited your kindness for their own gain.
cards.standalone_present_en: The scales are tipped! You feel exploited, giving a hundred but getting back ten. Or perhaps you are refusing to help despite being able to. Beware of bad debts or unfair contracts.
cards.standalone_future_en: If you don't balance giving and receiving, you will remain financially or emotionally subservient. Don't count on future windfalls; expected help might not arrive.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past sacrifices without fair return are causing present negativity. Without learning to say no or claim your rights, the future risks endless burdens of others.
cards.love_past_en: You gave your all to a partner receiving nothing back, or were a sugar daddy/mommy who got used.
cards.love_present_en: Unequal relationship; one takes forever, the other gives until exhausted. Or using money to buy love.
cards.love_future_en: Beware of being controlled by debt of gratitude, or paying off a prolonged karmic love debt.
cards.career_past_en: Worked hard for peanuts, or a boss stole credit for your work.
cards.career_present_en: Watch out for wage theft, exploitative contracts, or promotions with hidden strings attached.
cards.career_future_en: You might have to fight for your benefits, or quit due to unbearable unfairness.
cards.finance_past_en: Lent money that wasn't returned, or guaranteed a loan and got stuck with the debt.
cards.finance_present_en: Bad debt! Debtors vanish, or you are so cash-strapped you turn to loan sharks.
cards.finance_future_en: Finances will tighten if you don't save for yourself. Don't starve yourself to feed your friends' egos.
cards.action_prompt_en: Stop being a saint! Claim what is yours and learn to say 'No' when being exploited.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you buying love or acceptance with money?
cards.affirmation_en: I value myself, and I deserve fairness.
cards.hook_en: Be kind to others... but don't be cruel to your own wallet.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Write down names of debtors (or exploiters). Place a heavy stone on the paper to symbolize pressure for accountability or stopping the energy drain.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
When did you last give and regret it?
Who should you stop supporting financially?
How will you balance kindness with self-protection?
cards.keywords_light: Self-care, debt repayment, setting boundaries, financial independence, caution
cards.keywords_shadow: Stinginess, greed, exploitation, bad debt, inequality
cards.image_alt_en: A cat dropping scales that are unbalanced, coins falling into the mud, with a selfish cat hoarding a bag of gold in the background while ignoring a beggar cat.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A selfish wealthy cat clutching a bag of gold tightly, turning its back on a starving beggar cat, unbalanced scales dropping coins into the mud, gloomy alleyway background, sense of greed and inequality, tarot card style, art nouveau, dark green and brown tones --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Six of Pentacles Reversed tarot meaning: Bad debt, exploitation, and selfishness. Learn how to stop being used and protect your assets.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Wasted effort, Impatience, Disappointing results, Giving up too soon, Bad investment
cards.standalone_past_en: You might have poured effort into something that yielded little return, or quit a project because you couldn't wait for success. Past disappointment has left you feeling discouraged.
cards.standalone_present_en: Working for nothing? You are questioning if your efforts are worth it, feeling like your garden won't bloom. Or perhaps your impatience to rush results is about to ruin everything.
cards.standalone_future_en: Without changing methods or goals, you face investment failure or wasted time on a dead end. It's time to decide: persist or pivot.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past frustration with waiting makes you impatient now. Without careful consideration and avoiding emotional decisions, the future risks loss.
cards.love_past_en: You gave your all to love with nothing in return, or waited for someone who never looked your way.
cards.love_present_en: Starting to give up on the relationship. Feeling efforts are futile, or tired of being the one waiting.
cards.love_future_en: You might decide to end a stagnant relationship or stop hoping vainly for the wrong person.
cards.career_past_en: Worked hard without a raise, or a long-term project was shelved.
cards.career_present_en: Feeling underpaid for the effort. Wanting to quit or lacking motivation to continue.
cards.career_future_en: Beware of quitting without a plan, or job-hopping so much you lack expertise.
cards.finance_past_en: Lost money on investments or wasted funds on useless things.
cards.finance_present_en: Investment returns are abysmal, or expenses exceed income causing cash flow issues.
cards.finance_future_en: Watch out for accumulated losses or debt from mismanagement.
cards.action_prompt_en: Don't jump to conclusions! Check if you're digging in the wrong place or just not deep enough. But if it's truly wrong, have the guts to abandon it.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you watering a dead stump, or just impatient that the tree hasn't grown yet?
cards.affirmation_en: I know when to persevere and when to let go.
cards.hook_en: You plant beans but expect durian... how is that possible, kitty?
cards.ritual_2min_en: Find one unused item in your home (a wasted investment). Donate or discard it to cut the energy of regret and make space for new things.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
Which project should you dump already?
Which effort do you regret the most?
If you stopped doing this today, how would your life improve?
cards.keywords_light: Cutting losses, re-evaluating, changing direction, learning from failure, honesty
cards.keywords_shadow: Laziness, giving up, bad investment, impatience, disappointment
cards.image_alt_en: A frustrated cat looking at withered vines with shriveled grapes, tossing a gardening tool aside in anger.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A frustrated gardener cat throwing a trowel on the ground next to a withered grapevine with shriveled brown fruit, overcast grey sky, dry cracked earth, mood of disappointment and failure, tarot card style, art nouveau, dull brown and grey tones --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Seven of Pentacles Reversed tarot meaning: Wasted effort, impatience, and bad investments. Learn when to cut your losses and move on.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Perfectionism, Sloppy work, Lack of focus, Dead-end job, Misdirected effort
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have poured your energy into the wrong task or obsessed over minor details, missing the big picture. Past efforts might have been wasted due to a lack of direction.
cards.standalone_present_en: Sloppy work! Your output is suffering due to haste or laziness. Conversely, you might be overworking to the point of neglecting yourself and others. Beware of burnout from repetitive drudgery.
cards.standalone_future_en: If you don't improve quality, you'll lose credibility and advancement chances. Stagnating without learning new skills will let others surpass you.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Misdirected effort in the past has led to present boredom and underperformance. Without self-improvement, the future risks being stuck in a dead-end job trap.
cards.love_past_en: You invested in a dead-end relationship or were too obsessed with work to have time for love.
cards.love_present_en: Love feels like a routine job; lacking attention to detail, or one partner is neglecting their duties.
cards.love_future_en: Without adding sweetness, the relationship will wither and become unbearably boring.
cards.career_past_en: Worked hard but incorrectly, or was overlooked due to a lack of necessary skills.
cards.career_present_en: Extremely bored! Wanting to quit daily, or doing superficial work just to get by.
cards.career_future_en: Beware of job loss due to incompetence, or staying stuck in the same position forever without promotion.
cards.finance_past_en: Wasted money on useless courses or invested effort without financial return.
cards.finance_present_en: Income is stagnant while expenses rise, or earning money through unsustainable, superficial means.
cards.finance_future_en: Finances won't grow unless you find side income or upskill to increase your value.
cards.action_prompt_en: Stop the sloppy work! Review it, or if you're bored, find a new challenge immediately.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you busy doing the 'right' thing, or just doing what you 'like'?
cards.affirmation_en: I work smart, not just hard.
cards.hook_en: Working hard in the wrong place gets you nowhere... time to change tactics?
cards.ritual_2min_en: Stop working for 2 minutes. Drink water and look out a window to reset your brain. Ask yourself, 'How can I make this task easier and better?'
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
Which part of your work are you slacking off on the most?
What skill do you know you should learn but keep procrastinating?
How can you cure daily boredom without quitting your job?
cards.keywords_light: Working smarter, taking a break, career change, prioritizing quality, seeking inspiration
cards.keywords_shadow: Laziness, perfectionism, boredom, mediocrity, lack of ambition
cards.image_alt_en: A bored cat tossing a half-finished coin aside, surrounded by a pile of poorly made pentacles, looking out the window distractedly.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A bored tabby cat carelessly tossing a malformed golden coin onto a pile of scrap metal, tools scattered messily on the floor, gazing distractedly out a workshop window at a bird, atmosphere of apathy and disarray, Tarot Art Nouveau style, dull colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Eight of Pentacles Reversed tarot meaning: Sloppy work, burnout, and lack of focus. Learn how to work smarter and regain motivation.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Financial dependence, Superficiality, Instability, Gilded cage, Living beyond means
cards.standalone_past_en: You might have lived beyond your means until funds ran dry, or relied too much on others, losing your independence. Past fake happiness is now taking its toll.
cards.standalone_present_en: Warning! You might be trapped in a beautiful but restrictive gilded cage. Finances look good on the outside but are hollow inside, or you are faking wealth while struggling to make ends meet.
cards.standalone_future_en: Unless you start building your own wealth, instability will strike. You might lose your comforts or have to swallow your pride to ask for help.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Over-reliance on others or materialism in the past leaves you unstable now. Without learning self-reliance quickly, the future risks loss.
cards.love_past_en: Dated someone for money or status, or was kept like a bird in a gilded cage.
cards.love_present_en: Unequal relationship; one relies financially on the other and can't speak up. Or love based on superficiality.
cards.love_future_en: Breakup due to financial issues, or realizing money can't buy true love.
cards.career_past_en: Had a cushy job with no growth, or got a position through connections, not merit.
cards.career_present_en: Feeling insecure at work, fearing layoff due to lack of achievement, or underpaid for hard work.
cards.career_future_en: Must upskill before it's too late. Don't rely on past glory or old reputation.
cards.finance_past_en: Splurged on luxury brands into debt, or made bad investments due to gullibility.
cards.finance_present_en: Living large! Expenses exceed income. Beware of debt incurred just to save face.
cards.finance_future_en: Financial secrets might be exposed, or assets liquidated for cash flow.
cards.action_prompt_en: Stop faking it! Accept reality, start saving, and truly learn to rely on yourself.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you trading your freedom for fake comfort?
cards.affirmation_en: I choose true freedom over fake luxury.
cards.hook_en: A gilded cage is still a cage... will you be a pet bird or fly out to hunt?
cards.ritual_2min_en: Avoid luxury brands or jewelry for one day. Dress simply to practice valuing yourself from within, not by what you wear.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What did you buy just to show off but don't actually like?
What is your biggest fear about having no money?
What skill must you learn to support yourself independently?
cards.keywords_light: Self-discipline, cutting expenses, reality check, seeking independence, honesty
cards.keywords_shadow: Dependency, superficiality, debt, theft, bad investment
cards.image_alt_en: A cat looking anxious in a messy garden with withered grapes, wearing a collar that is too tight, symbolizing the cost of materialism.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A disheveled cat in a neglected vineyard with rotting grapes, wearing a heavy golden collar that looks like a chain, anxious expression, cloudy sky, sense of lost luxury, tarot card style, art nouveau, dull colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Nine of Pentacles Reversed tarot meaning: Financial dependence, living beyond means, and superficiality. Learn how to regain true independence.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Financial ruin, Family feud, Inheritance loss, Instability, Burden of tradition
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have experienced a severe financial crash or a painful family feud over inheritance. The foundation you thought was solid crumbled beneath you.
cards.standalone_present_en: Home is not a safe haven! You might be shouldering heavy family debts or feeling suffocated by outdated traditions and rules. The stability you dreamed of seems to be slipping further away.
cards.standalone_future_en: If you don't break the cycle, you risk losing assets or your home. Family squabbles could lead to permanent rifts, or you'll be stuck supporting others indefinitely.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past foundational issues have left you feeling insecure and burdened now. Without reform or cutting losses, the future risks even greater loss.
cards.love_past_en: Broke up due to family disapproval, or married only to find you couldn't get along with the in-laws.
cards.love_present_en: Relationship is shaky due to money or relatives. Partners have mismatched futures, or one is undermining the other's security.
cards.love_future_en: Marriage plans might be scrapped due to lack of funds, or separation occurs over inheritance/debt issues.
cards.career_past_en: Family business failed, or quit a stable job because you couldn't stand the nepotism.
cards.career_present_en: Company instability; layoffs possible. Or you are being pushed out of a long-held position.
cards.career_future_en: Beware of losing your job late in career, or your built business collapsing if it doesn't adapt.
cards.finance_past_en: Bankruptcy, gambling losses, or being cut out of an inheritance.
cards.finance_present_en: Drowning in debt, cash flow dry, assets dwindling. Watch out for domestic money fights.
cards.finance_future_en: You might lack retirement savings or have to sell off heirlooms just to survive.
cards.action_prompt_en: Protect your wallet! Don't guarantee loans even for relatives. Start rebuilding your own stability from scratch.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you carrying the 'family karma'? Is it time to put it down?
cards.affirmation_en: I release ancestral burdens and forge my own path to wealth.
cards.hook_en: Even a golden castle can crumble... if the foundation isn't strong enough.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Organize your wallet, smooth out bills, and throw away old receipts to clear energy of lack. Tell your money, 'I can take care of you.'
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What false money belief did you inherit from your family?
If you had zero inheritance, how would you build security?
Which family burden should you refuse to carry?
cards.keywords_light: Breaking tradition, independence, starting over, releasing family karma, self-made
cards.keywords_shadow: Bankruptcy, family feud, loss of home, gambling debt, instability
cards.image_alt_en: A cat looking distressed outside a crumbling manor gate, with coins falling out of a hole in its bag.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A distressed tabby cat standing outside the rusty gates of a dilapidated mansion, a hole in its coin bag spilling gold coins onto the muddy ground, stormy grey sky, atmosphere of loss and decay, Tarot Art Nouveau style, muted colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Ten of Pentacles Reversed tarot meaning: Financial ruin, family feuds, and inheritance loss. Learn how to protect your assets and handle instability.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Emotional immaturity, Bad news, Unrequited love, Delusion, Creative block
cards.standalone_past_en: You might have been disillusioned by a love that turned out to be a daydream, or caused trouble by reacting overly emotionally. Past naivety may have led to pain.
cards.standalone_present_en: Drama overload! You are fragile, easily tearful, or so touchy that others walk on eggshells around you. Beware of rumors or false info that upsets you; don't believe everything instantly.
cards.standalone_future_en: If you don't control your emotions, you risk being deceived or stuck in disappointment. Creative blocks will persist if you don't stop wallowing.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past emotional fragility is causing present confusion and hypersensitivity. Without building emotional resilience, the future risks repeated disappointment.
cards.love_past_en: Got dumped, or crushed on someone unavailable. A painful unrequited love.
cards.love_present_en: Acting bratty, demanding too much attention, or deluding yourself that they are interested.
cards.love_future_en: Beware of heartbreak from unrealistic expectations or encountering insincere people.
cards.career_past_en: Artistic work was criticized, or pitched ideas were rejected, crushing confidence.
cards.career_present_en: Out of ideas! Creative block, feeling untalented, or being unprofessionally emotional at work.
cards.career_future_en: Bad news regarding work may arrive, or a planned project could be cancelled midway.
cards.finance_past_en: Wasted money on nonsense or toys that sit unused.
cards.finance_present_en: Emotional spending when stressed or sad. Watch out, or your wallet will be empty before you know it.
cards.finance_future_en: Expected financial help might not arrive on time; you'll have to rely on yourself.
cards.action_prompt_en: Stop the drama! Wipe your tears and return to reality. Let logic guide your feelings for a change.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you using your emotions as an excuse to shirk your responsibilities?
cards.affirmation_en: I learn to regulate my emotions and love myself mindfully.
cards.hook_en: Dead fish in the cup... a rotten dream stinks, throw it away.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Write down bad feelings, crumple the paper, and trash it immediately! Then splash cold water on your face to snap out of the gloom.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What do you repeatedly sulk about?
How do you vent emotions without hurting anyone?
How can you distinguish between 'reality' and 'fantasy' right now?
cards.keywords_light: Emotional maturity, reality check, grounding, sobriety, inner healing
cards.keywords_shadow: Mood swings, tantrums, blocked creativity, bad news, delusion
cards.image_alt_en: A sulking cat dropping a cup, the fish flopping on the ground gasping, symbolizing lost opportunities or emotional mishandling.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A sulking kitten dropping a golden chalice, a fish flopping on the dry ground gasping for water, gloomy grey sky, expression of regret and carelessness, Tarot Art Nouveau style, muted blue and grey tones --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Page of Cups Reversed tarot meaning: Emotional immaturity, bad news, and creative blocks. Learn how to handle mood swings and disappointment.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Moodiness, Unrealistic, Broken promises, Deception, Unrequited love
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have fallen for sweet but empty words, or been trapped in an emotionally volatile relationship. Past fantasies led to painful realities.
cards.standalone_present_en: Beware the frog prince! Someone charming might be insincere, just playing games. Or perhaps you are letting emotions cloud your judgment, ignoring red flags. High expectations may lead to disappointment.
cards.standalone_future_en: If you keep wearing rose-colored glasses, you risk deception or a harsh reality check. An offer that looks too good might have hidden strings.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past sensitivity has left you vulnerable. Without careful discernment now, the future risks heartbreak from gullibility and ignoring the truth.
cards.love_past_en: You dealt with a smooth talker who broke promises, or a relationship ended due to emotional instability.
cards.love_present_en: Partner is unpredictable, sulky, or passive-aggressive. Watch out for cheating or lies.
cards.love_future_en: Disappointment with a crush is likely, or the relationship stalls because one side isn't serious.
cards.career_past_en: Took a job that looked good but lacked substance, or got sucked into a pipe dream business.
cards.career_present_en: Beware of verbal promises at work. Don't quit until you have a signed contract. Artistic temperament might delay tasks.
cards.career_future_en: Dream projects might fail, or you'll be criticized for unprofessionalism.
cards.finance_past_en: Wasted money on useless luxuries or lent money that was never repaid.
cards.finance_present_en: Money leaks due to entertainment or spoiling others. Beware of investment scams.
cards.finance_future_en: You might be disappointed when projected income falls short.
cards.action_prompt_en: Take off the rose-colored glasses! Read people carefully and take words with a grain of salt. Don't give your heart until you see real action.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you in love with their 'image' or their 'true self'?
cards.affirmation_en: I am mindful of my emotions and the truth.
cards.hook_en: Sweet words are like candy... too much is sickly and offers no nutrition.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Splash your face with ice-cold water to wake up! Write down their promises vs. their actions to see the reality gap clearly.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What lie did you fall for?
Which emotion makes you make mistakes most often?
If you remove the infatuation, what is the real situation?
cards.keywords_light: Emotional boundaries, realism, seeing truth, self-protection, maturity
cards.keywords_shadow: Deception, moodiness, manipulation, fantasy, heartbreak
cards.image_alt_en: A knight falling off a seahorse into muddy water, spilling the cup, looking disheveled and confused.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A clumsy white cat knight slipping off a seahorse into murky water, dropping a golden cup, spilling dark liquid, disillusioned expression, overcast sky, Tarot Art Nouveau style, moody colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Knight of Cups Reversed tarot meaning: Deception, moodiness, and unrealistic expectations. Learn how to spot a player and protect your heart.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Emotional instability, Clinginess, Martyrdom, Moodiness, Manipulative
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have poured yourself out caring for others until you were empty, or sunk into a deep emotional low. The resentment of unrequited care still lingers.
cards.standalone_present_en: Emotional flood! Your mood is swinging like a storm at sea, confusing everyone around you. Beware of playing the tragic heroine just to get sympathy.
cards.standalone_future_en: Unless you manage your emotions, you'll repel people who fear your drama. Or you might become so emotionally dependent that you can't stand on your own feet.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past emotional fragility is erupting now. Without building emotional resilience, the future risks loneliness caused by excessive sensitivity.
cards.love_past_en: You loved hard and hated hard, or endured a painful relationship simply out of fear of abandonment.
cards.love_present_en: Jealous, paranoid, or constantly demanding attention. The relationship is suffocating because emotion is overriding logic.
cards.love_future_en: Your partner might snap from your neediness, or you could attract someone who exploits your soft-heartedness.
cards.career_past_en: You let personal feelings ruin work, or were exploited by colleagues because you couldn't say no.
cards.career_present_en: Easily stressed, crying at work, or taking criticism so personally it paralyzes your productivity.
cards.career_future_en: You might be seen as emotionally immature, or be manipulated into making mistakes out of pity.
cards.finance_past_en: Lost money helping others to your own detriment, or overspent on retail therapy.
cards.finance_present_en: Making emotional financial decisions; impulse buying, or too afraid to ask for lent money back.
cards.finance_future_en: Beware of scammers who befriend you, or losing money due to misplaced trust.
cards.action_prompt_en: Stop the drama! Get a grip and distinguish between 'feelings' and 'facts'. Don't let emotions rule you.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you caring for others just so they will care for you in return?
cards.affirmation_en: I am responsible for my own happiness, and I am strong enough to stand alone.
cards.hook_en: Tears don't solve everything... dry them and stand strong.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Write out all your grievances or anger on paper, then tear it up and trash it immediately. Do not keep it. Practice cutting negative emotions.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
Which emotion controls my life the most right now?
Have I ever done something I disliked just to please others?
How can I make myself happy without relying on anyone?
cards.keywords_light: Setting boundaries, emotional self-reliance, clarity, detachment, self-care
cards.keywords_shadow: Insecurity, depression, smothering, manipulation, victim mentality
cards.image_alt_en: A Queen of Cups looking disheveled and teary-eyed, holding an empty cup upside down, sitting on a throne surrounded by turbulent waves.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A disheveled white cat queen with teary eyes sitting on a shell throne amidst stormy dark waves, holding an upside-down golden goblet, gloomy atmosphere, emotional turbulence, Tarot Art Nouveau style, dark blue and grey tones --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Queen of Cups Reversed tarot meaning: Emotional instability, moodiness, and codependency. Learn how to regain emotional balance and independence.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Emotional manipulation, Moodiness, Coldness, Addiction, Unreliable
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have been a victim of emotional manipulation or lost control yourself, hurting those around you. Scars from past emotional instability still linger.
cards.standalone_present_en: The sea is raging! You (or someone close) are experiencing extreme mood swings, losing control, or using emotions as bargaining chips. Beware of using drugs or alcohol to cope.
cards.standalone_future_en: If you don't deal with your inner demons soon, you'll become someone everyone avoids. Relationships will crumble due to selfishness, or you'll face escalating mental health issues.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past emotional instability is erupting now. Without healing and regaining control, the future risks loneliness and drowning in unsolvable problems.
cards.love_past_en: You encountered a manipulative player or a partner who gaslit you until you lost your balance.
cards.love_present_en: Toxic relationship; one dominates with emotions, the other walks on eggshells. Secrets and lies are present.
cards.love_future_en: Beware of emotional abuse or a messy breakup fueled by resentment.
cards.career_past_en: The boss was unpredictable, or you used connections unethically.
cards.career_present_en: Workplace is tense due to a moody boss or manipulative backstabbing.
cards.career_future_en: Reputation might be damaged by scandal, or credibility lost due to lack of emotional control.
cards.finance_past_en: Lost money to vices or was scammed by someone trusted.
cards.finance_present_en: Heavy emotional spending, or hiding financial problems under the rug.
cards.finance_future_en: Debt problems may arise from lack of mindfulness, or you could be swindled by someone close.
cards.action_prompt_en: Stop! Before you speak, breathe deep and ask, 'Is this what I truly want to communicate?'
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you using 'tears' or 'anger' to get what you want?
cards.affirmation_en: I choose sincerity and transparency in my expression.
cards.hook_en: A stormy sea is scary... but a smiling person hiding a knife is scarier.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Fill a glass almost to the brim. Walk slowly around the room without spilling a drop to practice focus and emotional steadiness.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
Which emotion do I use as a weapon against others?
Have I ever lied to myself about my feelings?
What is a better way to vent stress than lashing out?
cards.keywords_light: Setting boundaries, detoxing, seeking therapy, sobriety, honesty
cards.keywords_shadow: Manipulation, addiction, moodiness, cruelty, emotional blackmail
cards.image_alt_en: A King of Cups looking disheveled, spilling wine from his cup onto the floor, with a stormy sea behind him and a treacherous expression.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A disheveled ginger cat king slouching on a throne, spilling red wine from a golden goblet, dark stormy waves crashing violently in the background, expression of deceit and instability, Tarot Art Nouveau style, dark moody colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: King of Cups Reversed tarot meaning: Emotional manipulation, moodiness, and deceit. Learn how to spot red flags and protect your peace.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Gossip, Paranoia, Hasty speech, Misinformation, Spying
cards.standalone_past_en: You might have been a victim of rumors, or spoke thoughtlessly, causing major trouble. Past paranoia has left you distrustful of everyone.
cards.standalone_present_en: Watch your mouth! Your words are too sharp and cutting. Or perhaps you are so obsessed with finding faults that you've become paranoid. The news you receive might be fake; don't share it yet.
cards.standalone_future_en: If you don't mind your tongue, you'll make enemies unknowingly, or face conflict from unclear communication. Spying on others will bring trouble.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past paranoia and miscommunication are causing present chaos. Without filtering information and words mindfully, the future risks unnecessary drama.
cards.love_past_en: Fought due to sarcastic remarks, or the relationship was ruined by excessive snooping.
cards.love_present_en: Paranoid partner! Checking phones, stalking Facebook, nitpicking every move, or frequent hurtful words.
cards.love_future_en: Rumors might cause misunderstandings, or thoughtless speech will lead to escalating arguments.
cards.career_past_en: Was gossiped about at work, or sent an erroneous email that caused an issue.
cards.career_present_en: Beware of office politics. Don't be gullible to rumors. Work data might be inaccurate; double-check everything.
cards.career_future_en: Contracts might have loopholes, or rivals steal ideas because you talk too much.
cards.finance_past_en: Believed hype and lost money, or signed a contract without reading the fine print.
cards.finance_present_en: Beware of fake investment news. Don't transfer money until you've vetted the seller.
cards.finance_future_en: Financial document disputes may arise, or fines due to missing terms and conditions.
cards.action_prompt_en: Zip it! Think before you speak, and stop prying into others' business. Focus on your own affairs.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you using your intelligence to find fault in others, or to improve yourself?
cards.affirmation_en: I speak the truth with kindness and choose to listen only to what is beneficial.
cards.hook_en: Too curious about others' business... careful, you might learn something you don't want to know!
cards.ritual_2min_en: Turn off social media notifications for 1 hour. Write down 3 good things about someone you dislike to practice overlooking faults and reducing bias.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What recent rumor did you hear and accidentally believe?
Which words have you spoken that you regret the most?
How can you change the habit of 'speaking without thinking'?
cards.keywords_light: Silence, discretion, double-checking, waiting for facts, introspection
cards.keywords_shadow: Gossip, paranoia, rude speech, deceit, spying
cards.image_alt_en: A sneaky cat hiding behind a bush with a telescope, spying on other cats, while holding a sword clumsily.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A nosy tabby cat hiding behind a green bush holding a telescope to spy on others, a silver sword lying carelessly on the ground, shifty eyes, atmosphere of suspicion and gossip, Tarot Art Nouveau style, muted greens and greys --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Page of Swords Reversed tarot meaning: Gossip, paranoia, and hasty speech. Learn how to avoid drama and communicate wisely.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Impulsiveness, Haste, Aggression, Tactlessness, Burnout
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have made mistakes due to haste, or destroyed relationships with harsh words. The scars of past impulsiveness serve as a warning.
cards.standalone_present_en: Slow down, speed racer! You are rushing blindly, lacking mindfulness, and potentially heading for disaster. Beware that aggressive words and actions create unnecessary enemies.
cards.standalone_future_en: If you don't slow down and think carefully, you will trip over your own feet, or rushed projects will crash. Pausing to review plans is better than charging recklessly into failure.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past impatience makes you prone to errors and conflict now. Without regaining composure and slowing down, the future risks failure born of negligence.
cards.love_past_en: Had explosive arguments due to thoughtless words, or aggression ruined the relationship.
cards.love_present_en: Watch your mouth! Cutting words will destroy good feelings. Tension is high because neither side will back down.
cards.love_future_en: Violent verbal clashes might lead to a breakup, or the relationship ends due to exhaustion with the other's impatience.
cards.career_past_en: Made mistakes by rushing deadlines, or clashed with colleagues due to a loose tongue.
cards.career_present_en: Sloppy work! Finished fast but poor quality, or frustrated because things aren't going your way. Expect criticism for carelessness.
cards.career_future_en: Projects might fail due to poor planning, or you'll waste time fixing mistakes.
cards.finance_past_en: Lost money due to quick decisions, or was scammed because of lack of due diligence.
cards.finance_present_en: Spending recklessly without thinking, or investing blindly in trends. Beware of running out of cash before month-end.
cards.finance_future_en: Debt may arise from unnecessary spending, or bad investments will have long-term consequences.
cards.action_prompt_en: Hit the brakes now! Breathe deeply and count to 10 before saying or doing anything.
cards.reflection_question_en: Is your haste destroying what you have built with your own hands?
cards.affirmation_en: I calm my mind and reflect before I act.
cards.hook_en: The faster you rush, the slower you go... remember that, kitty.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Sit still, close your eyes. Visualize a tornado in your head. Breathe slowly to calm the storm into a gentle breeze.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
Which mistake was caused by your impatience?
What harsh words do you want to apologize for?
How do you regain control when angry?
cards.keywords_light: Patience, mindfulness, careful planning, diplomacy, tact
cards.keywords_shadow: Impulsiveness, aggression, recklessness, rude, scattered
cards.image_alt_en: A knight falling off his horse because he was riding too fast, sword flying out of hand, looking frustrated and disheveled.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A clumsy ginger cat knight tumbling off a speeding greyhound-like horse, silver sword flying into the air, dust cloud rising, expression of shock and frustration, chaotic energy, Tarot Art Nouveau style, sharp angles --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Knight of Swords Reversed tarot meaning: Impatience, recklessness, and bad decisions. Learn how to slow down and avoid disaster.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Bitter, Cold-hearted, Cruel words, Overly critical, Isolation
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have been hurt so badly that your heart turned cold, or you used harsh words to protect yourself. Past bitterness has made you cynical.
cards.standalone_present_en: Watch your mouth! Your criticism is cutting deep. Or you are judging others unfairly with cold logic. Your intelligence is becoming a weapon against yourself.
cards.standalone_future_en: If you don't soften your hardness, you will find yourself standing alone on a freezing peak. No one will dare approach for fear of being cut.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past wounds built armor so thick it's now just coldness. Without learning to soften, the future risks loneliness without understanding.
cards.love_past_en: A relationship ended with harsh words, or your coldness drove your partner away.
cards.love_present_en: Beware of sarcasm or using logic to invalidate feelings. You might be pushing your partner away without realizing it.
cards.love_future_en: Relationships might crumble due to sharp tongues, or you'll end up alone because no one meets your impossibly high standards.
cards.career_past_en: You clashed with colleagues due to blunt criticism or were seen as the office meanie.
cards.career_present_en: Communication breakdown! Your words are seen as aggressive, or you are micromanaging and nitpicking others' work.
cards.career_future_en: You might be isolated at work or miss opportunities due to an overly rigid attitude.
cards.finance_past_en: Made a bad financial decision out of spite or anger.
cards.finance_present_en: Stressed from being too strict with money. Afraid to enjoy life, or stinginess makes others uncomfortable.
cards.finance_future_en: Beware of prolonged legal issues or lawsuits that drain your finances.
cards.action_prompt_en: Put down the sword and listen with your heart! Honesty doesn't have to hurt. Speak kindly.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you using 'the truth' as an excuse to be cruel?
cards.affirmation_en: I choose words that build up and are full of compassion.
cards.hook_en: Words are like knives... handle without care and you cut both the listener and yourself.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Suck on a sweet candy while thinking about what to say to someone, reminding yourself to sweeten your tone.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
Which words do you regret speaking the most?
Why are you afraid of showing gentleness?
How can you critique others without hurting them?
cards.keywords_light: Softening up, forgiveness, constructive criticism, tact, warmth
cards.keywords_shadow: Cruelty, bitterness, resentment, nagging, isolation
cards.image_alt_en: A Queen of Swords looking angry, pointing her sword aggressively, with storm clouds gathering behind her.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A stern Siamese cat queen pointing a sword aggressively forward, expression of anger and bitterness, dark storm clouds gathering in the background, sharp jagged rocks, Tarot Art Nouveau style, cold grey and steel blue tones --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Queen of Swords Reversed tarot meaning: Bitterness, cruelty, and cold-heartedness. Learn how to soften your approach and heal relationships.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Abuse of power, Cruelty, Manipulation, Tyranny, Narrow-mindedness
cards.standalone_past_en: You may have dealt with a tyrannical leader who abused their power, or you made a mistake by clinging too rigidly to rules without compassion.
cards.standalone_present_en: Dark power at play! You are facing injustice, slander, or legal manipulation. Or perhaps you are the one using cunning intelligence to exploit others. Your coldness is hurting those around you.
cards.standalone_future_en: Without an attitude adjustment, you'll become a lonely, bitter tyrant. Ruling by intimidation will eventually lead to rebellion and failure.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past rigidity is creating enemies now. Without balancing authority with mercy, the future holds isolation and a loss of power.
cards.love_past_en: Dated a dictator who controlled your life or used verbally abusive language.
cards.love_present_en: Relationship is ice-cold. Cutting words are exchanged, or one partner tries to micromanage the other.
cards.love_future_en: Beware of a breakup fueled by hate, or enduring ongoing psychological pressure.
cards.career_past_en: Had a tyrannical boss who abused power, or was unfairly dismissed.
cards.career_present_en: Fear rules the workplace due to oppressive leadership. Or you might be exploiting loopholes for personal gain.
cards.career_future_en: You might face lawsuits or lose your position due to inhumane decisions.
cards.finance_past_en: Was cheated through legal loopholes or lost money due to negligence.
cards.finance_present_en: Beware of financial lawsuits, asset seizure, or shady contracts.
cards.finance_future_en: Huge expenses might arise from legal battles or fines for rule violations.
cards.action_prompt_en: Lower your guard! Don't weaponize rules. Try seeing other perspectives and leading with compassion.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you using your intelligence to 'create' or to 'destroy'?
cards.affirmation_en: I use my power with responsibility and compassion.
cards.hook_en: Being smart but unloved... is a lonely place to be.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Breathe deep. Visualize someone you dislike and send them kindness (Metta Meditation) for 1 minute to melt your own inner hardness.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
When did you last overstep your authority?
Have you ever misjudged someone due to bias?
How can you repair a relationship broken by your words?
cards.keywords_light: Re-evaluating beliefs, apologizing, seeking truth, breaking bad habits, humility
cards.keywords_shadow: Cruelty, manipulation, injustice, corruption, mental abuse
cards.image_alt_en: A corrupt King of Swords looking down with a sneer, holding a cracked sword, dark storm clouds gathering, throne looking unstable.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A sinister grey cat king sneering from a crooked stone throne, holding a chipped sword, dark purple storm clouds swirling ominously, jagged lightning, atmosphere of corruption and danger, Tarot Art Nouveau style --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: King of Swords Reversed tarot meaning: Abuse of power, cruelty, and manipulation. Learn to avoid tyranny and unfair judgment.

cards.tarot_imply_en: Lack of focus, Laziness, Missed opportunity, Procrastination, Financial setbacks
cards.standalone_past_en: You might have missed a golden opportunity due to lethargy, or quit something halfway. Past negligence has left your foundation shaky.
cards.standalone_present_en: Stop daydreaming! You are wasting time on nonsense, lacking focus in studies or work. Or you might be facing minor financial hitches caused by your own carelessness.
cards.standalone_future_en: If you don't change your habits, you won't master anything, and opportunities will slip to those who work harder. Beware of losing money due to ignorance.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past inertia has led to present stagnation. Without waking up and paying attention, the future risks failure in new beginnings.
cards.love_past_en: A relationship that didn't grow because neither tried, or a casual fling with no seriousness.
cards.love_present_en: Bored, too lazy to be romantic, or neglecting your partner for other things. Watch out, they might feel hurt.
cards.love_future_en: The relationship might fade into estrangement, or you'll miss the chance with a good person because you stalled.
cards.career_past_en: Made mistakes due to carelessness, or was reprimanded for lack of responsibility.
cards.career_present_en: Lost the drive to learn. Finding work boring or too hard. Beware of missing deadlines.
cards.career_future_en: You might fail an exam, probation, or miss a promotion due to lacking necessary skills.
cards.finance_past_en: Overspent on luxuries or paid 'stupidity tax' due to lack of research.
cards.finance_present_en: Finances are tight due to indiscipline, or unexpected petty expenses are popping up.
cards.finance_future_en: Expected income might be delayed, or investments will underperform. Tighten your belt.
cards.action_prompt_en: Wake up! Stop procrastinating and refocus on the goal in front of you right now.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you using 'ignorance' as an excuse not to take action?
cards.affirmation_en: I overcome laziness and am committed to self-improvement.
cards.timing_hint: Delayed due to lack of effort
cards.hook_en: Opportunity is like ice cream... if you don't eat it fast, it melts, kitty.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Organize your wallet. Toss old receipts, arrange bills neatly. This clears financial clutter and brings mindfulness back.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What important task have you delayed for weeks?
What knowledge gap caused you to miss an opportunity?
What is a creative cure for boredom besides scrolling?
